/* [com.coway.trust.biz.sales.order.service.impl.OrderSummaryMapper.selectOrderSummary] 20191002 - KR OHK */ SELECT T.ORD_ID , T.CUST_VA_NO , T.ORD_NO , T.CUST_NAME , T.JOM_PAY_REF , T.CORP_TYPE_ID , T.CUST_TYPE , T.CUST_ID , T.ORD_STUS_CODE , T.ORD_DT , T.INST_AREA , T.INST_STATE , T.STK_CODE , T.APP_TYPE_CODE , T.RENT_PAY_MODE_DESC , T.RENTAL_STUS , T.NOR_RNT_FEE , T.CURR_MTH_CHRG , T.CURR_NO_MONTH_OF_RENTAL_BILL , T.RENT_CURR_OTSTND , T.RPF_BILL_AMT , T.RPF_PAY_AMT , T.RPF_ADJ_AMT , T.ORD_UNBILL_AMT , T.RENTAL_BILL_NO , T.ORD_LAST_PAY_DT , T.WEB_RENT_LEDGER , T.CUST_BILL_GRP_NO , T.SRV_CNTRCT_NO , T.APP_TYPE_DESC , T.ORG_CODE , T.GRP_CODE , T.DEPT_CODE , T.ORD_MEM_CODE , T.ORD_MEM_NAME , T.ORD_PROMO_CODE , T.ORD_PROMO_DESC , T.ORD_PV_MONTH || '/' ||T.ORD_PV_YEAR NET_SALE_MONTH FROM (SELECT A.ORD_ID , A.CUST_VA_NO , A.ORD_NO , A.CUST_NAME , A.JOM_PAY_REF , A.CORP_TYPE_ID , A.CUST_TYPE , A.CUST_ID , A.ORD_STUS_CODE , A.ORD_DT
, '( ' || A.STOCK_CODE || ' ) ' || A.STOCK_DESC STK_CODE , CASE WHEN A.APP_TYPE_CODE IN ('OUT','INS','EDU') OR pay52.ACC_DEBT_SRV_CNTRCT_ID IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN pay52.ACC_DEBT_SRV_CNTRCT_ID = 0 THEN 'Sales' ELSE 'Service' END AS APP_TYPE_CODE
, A.RENTAL_STUS , DECODE(A.APP_TYPE_CODE, 'REN', A.NOR_RNT_FEE, NULL) AS NOR_RNT_FEE
, pay53.ACC_DEBT_SUB_CURR_CHRG AS CURR_MTH_CHRG , pay53.ACC_DEBT_SUB_PAY_SCHDUL_NO AS CURR_NO_MONTH_OF_RENTAL_BILL , pay53.ACC_DEBT_SUB_TOT_OTSTND AS RENT_CURR_OTSTND , DECODE(A.APP_TYPE_CODE, 'REN', pay53.ACC_DEBT_SUB_RPF_CHRG, A.ORD_AMT) AS RPF_BILL_AMT , pay53.ACC_DEBT_SUB_RPF_COLCT AS RPF_PAY_AMT , pay53.ACC_DEBT_SUB_RPF_ADJ AS RPF_ADJ_AMT , pay53.ACC_DEBT_SUB_RENTAL_BILL_NO AS RENTAL_BILL_NO
, PYM.CODE AS RENT_PAY_MODE_DESC , pay52.ACC_DEBT_SRV_CNTRCT_NO AS SRV_CNTRCT_NO
, NVL(sys64.AREA, ' ') AS INST_AREA , NVL(sys64.STATE, ' ') AS INST_STATE
, (SELECT UN_BILL_AMT FROM REP0010S WHERE ORD_ID = A.ORD_ID AND SRV_CNTRCT_ID = pay52.ACC_DEBT_SRV_CNTRCT_ID) AS ORD_UNBILL_AMT , (SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(RENT_DT_TM),'DD/MM/YYYY') FROM PAY0022D WHERE RENT_SO_ID=A.ORD_ID) AS ORD_LAST_PAY_DT , (SELECT SUM(RENT_AMT) FROM PAY0022D WHERE RENT_SO_ID=A.ORD_ID GROUP BY RENT_SO_ID UNION SELECT SUM(SRV_LDGR_AMT) FROM PAY0023D WHERE SRV_SALES_ORD_ID=A.ORD_ID AND SRV_LDGR_CNTRCT_ID <> 0 GROUP BY SRV_SALES_ORD_ID UNION SELECT SUM(TRADE_AMT) FROM PAY0035D WHERE TRADE_SO_ID=A.ORD_ID GROUP BY TRADE_SO_ID ) AS WEB_RENT_LEDGER
/*
, E.INST_AREA , E.INST_STATE
, E.CURR_MTH_CHRG , E.CURR_NO_MONTH_OF_RENTAL_BILL , E.RENT_CURR_OTSTND , E.RPF_BILL_AMT , E.RPF_PAY_AMT , E.RPF_ADJ_AMT , E.RENTAL_BILL_NO
, E.ORD_PAY_MODE AS RENT_PAY_MODE_DESC , E.UN_BILL_AMT AS ORD_UNBILL_AMT , E.ORD_LAST_PAY_DT , E.WEB_RENT_LDGR_CURR_OTSTND AS WEB_RENT_LEDGER
, E.SRV_CNTRCT_NO */
, DECODE(A.APP_TYPE_CODE, 'REN', A.CUST_BILL_GRP_NO, NULL) AS CUST_BILL_GRP_NO
, A.APP_TYPE_DESC , A.ORD_ORG_CODE AS ORG_CODE , A.ORD_GRP_CODE AS GRP_CODE , A.ORD_DEPT_CODE AS DEPT_CODE
, A.ORD_MEM_CODE , A.ORD_MEM_NAME
, A.ORD_PROMO_CODE , A.ORD_PROMO_DESC
, A.ORD_PV_YEAR , A.ORD_PV_MONTH
FROM ( SELECT SOM.SALES_ORD_ID ORD_ID, SOM.SALES_ORD_NO ORD_NO, NVL(RS.STUS_CODE_ID,' ') RENTAL_STUS, SOM.STUS_CODE_ID ORD_STUS_ID, S.CODE ORD_STUS_CODE, S.NAME ORD_STUS_NAME, SOM.SALES_DT ORD_DT, NVL(SOM.INST_PRIOD,0) INSTLMT_PRIOD, SOM.TOT_AMT AS ORD_AMT, ( CASE WHEN SOM.APP_TYPE_ID = 66 THEN NVL(SOM.MTH_RENT_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) ORD_MTH_RENTAL, NVL(SOM.TOT_PV,0) ORD_PV, NVL(SOM.PV_MONTH,0) ORD_PV_MONTH, NVL(SOM.PV_YEAR,0) ORD_PV_YEAR, NVL(SOM.REF_NO,' ') ORD_REF_NO, NVL(SOM.CUST_PO_NO,' ') ORD_PO_NO, NVL(SOM.DEPT_CODE,' ') ORD_DEPT_CODE, NVL(SOM.GRP_CODE,' ') ORD_GRP_CODE, NVL(SOM.ORG_CODE,' ') ORD_ORG_CODE, SOM.CRT_DT ORD_CRT_DT, SOM.APP_TYPE_ID, T.CODE APP_TYPE_CODE, T.CODE_NAME APP_TYPE_DESC, SOD.ITM_PRC_ID, STK.STK_ID STOCK_ID, STK.STK_CODE STOCK_CODE, STK.STK_DESC STOCK_DESC, STK.MASTER_STK_ID, C.CUST_ID CUST_ID, C.CORP_TYPE_ID, ( CASE WHEN C.TYPE_ID <> 964 AND C.CORP_TYPE_ID > 0 THEN ( NVL(CUSTTYPE.CODE_NAME,' ') || ' (' || NVL(CORPTYPE.CODE_NAME,' ') || ')' ) ELSE NVL(CUSTTYPE.CODE_NAME,' ') END ) CUST_TYPE, C.NAME CUST_NAME, C.NRIC CUST_NRIC, ( CASE WHEN NVL(C.TYPE_ID,0) = 964 THEN NVL(C.DOB,TO_DATE('19000101','YYYYMMDD') ) ELSE TO_DATE('19000101','YYYYMMDD') END ) AS CUST_DOB, NVL(C.EMAIL,' ') CUST_EMAIL, NVL(C.CUST_VA_NO,' ') CUST_VA_NO, C.PAS_SPORT_EXPR CUST_PASSPORT_EXPR, C.VISA_EXPR CUST_VISA_EXPR, NVL(SOM.PROMO_ID,0) ORD_PROMO_ID, NVL(PM.PROMO_CODE,' ') ORD_PROMO_CODE, NVL(PM.PROMO_DESC,' ') ORD_PROMO_DESC, NVL(MEM.MEM_ID,0) ORD_MEM_ID, NVL(MEM.MEM_CODE,' ') ORD_MEM_CODE, NVL(MEM.NAME,' ') ORD_MEM_NAME, NVL(MEM.NRIC,' ') ORD_MEM_NRIC, NVL(MEM.MEM_TYPE,0) ORD_MEM_TYPE_ID, NVL(SOM.BRNCH_ID,0) KEYIN_BRNCH_ID, NVL(SOM.REM,' ') ORD_REM, ( CASE WHEN SOM.APP_TYPE_ID = 66 THEN NVL(SOM.REN_CHK_ID,0) ELSE 0 END ) RENT_CHK_ID, NVL(SOM.SALES_HM_ID,0) ORD_HM_ID, NVL(SOM.SALES_SM_ID,0) ORD_SM_ID, NVL(SOM.SALES_GM_ID,0) ORD_GM_ID, NVL(SOM.CUST_ADD_ID,0) ORD_ADDR_ID, NVL(SOM.CUST_CNT_ID,0) ORD_CNTC_ID, NVL(SOM.CUST_CARE_CNT_ID,0) CUST_CARE_CNT_ID, SOM.UPD_DT UPD_DT, CBM.CUST_BILL_PAY_REF_NO1 JOM_PAY_REF, STK.STK_CTGRY_ID, C.TYPE_ID CUST_TYPE_ID, NVL(SOM.CUST_BILL_ID,0) CUST_BILL_ID, SOM.EMP_CHK, SOM.EX_TRADE, SOM.GST_CHK, SOM.CNVR_SCHEME_ID, SOM.PROMO_DISC_PERIOD_TP, SOM.PROMO_DISC_PERIOD, SOM.NOR_AMT, SOM.NOR_RNT_FEE, SOM.DISC_RNT_FEE, SOM.SRV_PAC_ID, SOM.ADV_BILL, FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,C.CRT_DT) ) CRT_DUR, NVL(CBM.CUST_BILL_GRP_NO,' ') CUST_BILL_GRP_NO, SOM.PCKAGE_BINDING_NO AS PCKAGE_BINDING_NO FROM SAL0001D SOM JOIN SAL0029D C ON C.CUST_ID = SOM.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M CORPTYPE ON CORPTYPE.CODE_ID = C.CORP_TYPE_ID AND C.TYPE_ID <> 964 AND C.CORP_TYPE_ID > 0 LEFT JOIN SYS0013M CUSTTYPE ON CUSTTYPE.CODE_ID = C.TYPE_ID
JOIN SAL0002D SOD ON SOD.SALES_ORD_ID = SOM.SALES_ORD_ID JOIN SYS0026M STK ON STK.STK_ID = SOD.ITM_STK_ID JOIN SYS0013M T ON T.CODE_ID = SOM.APP_TYPE_ID JOIN SYS0038M S ON S.STUS_CODE_ID = SOM.STUS_CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0024D CBM ON SOM.CUST_BILL_ID = CBM.CUST_BILL_ID
LEFT JOIN SAL0071D RS ON RS.SALES_ORD_ID = SOM.SALES_ORD_ID AND SOM.APP_TYPE_ID = 66 LEFT JOIN SAL0017D PM ON PM.PROMO_ID = SOM.PROMO_ID AND NVL(SOM.PROMO_ID,0) <> 0 LEFT JOIN ORG0001D MEM ON MEM.MEM_ID = SOM.MEM_ID AND NVL(SOM.MEM_ID,0) <> 0
WHERE 1 =1
AND SOM.SALES_ORD_NO = #{ordNo}
AND C.NRIC = #{custIc}
AND CBM.CUST_BILL_GRP_NO = #{groupNo}
AND SOM.ORG_CODE = #{orgCode}
AND SOM.GRP_CODE = #{grpCode}
AND SOM.DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode}
AND MEM.MEM_CODE = #{memCode}
AND C.CUST_ID = #{custId}
AND C.NAME LIKE '%'|| #{custName} || '%'
AND SOM.APP_TYPE_ID IN
#{item}
AND SOM.SALES_DT >=TO_DATE(#{createStDate}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AND SOM.SALES_DT <TO_DATE(#{createEnDate}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') +1
AND STK.STK_ID = #{cmbProduct}
AND SOM.PV_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE(#{netSalesMonth},'MM/YYYY')) AND SOM.PV_MONTH = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TO_DATE(#{netSalesMonth},'MM/YYYY'))
AND MEM.MEM_CODE = #{salesmanCode}
AND SOM.STUS_CODE_ID = 1
AND SOM.STUS_CODE_ID = 10
AND SOM.STUS_CODE_ID = 4 AND SOM.PV_YEAR > 0 AND SOM.PV_MONTH > 0
AND SOM.STUS_CODE_ID = 4 AND SOM.PV_YEAR = 0 AND SOM.PV_MONTH = 0
AND PM.PROMO_CODE = #{promoCode}
) A --LEFT OUTER JOIN REP0010S E ON E.ORD_ID = A.ORD_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN PAY0052S pay52 ON pay52.ACC_DEBT_ORD_ID = A.ORD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PAY0053S pay53 ON pay53.ACC_DEBT_ORD_ID = A.ORD_ID AND pay52.ACC_DEBT_SRV_CNTRCT_ID = pay53.ACC_DEBT_SRV_CNTRCT_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAL0074D sal74 ON sal74.SALES_ORD_ID = A.ORD_ID AND sal74.SVC_CNTRCT_ID = pay52.ACC_DEBT_SRV_CNTRCT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0013M PYM ON PYM.CODE_ID = sal74.MODE_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAL0045D INS ON INS.SALES_ORD_ID = A.ORD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAL0023D IADD ON IADD.CUST_ADD_ID = INS.ADD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0064M sys64 ON sys64.AREA_ID = IADD.AREA_ID AND sys64.STATUS_ID = 1
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAL0046D K ON K.SALES_ORD_ID = A.ORD_ID AND K.INSTALL_ENTRY_ID = FN_GET_SAL0046D_MAX_ID (A.ORD_ID, '3')
WHERE 1 =1
AND A.ORD_STUS_ID = 1
AND A.ORD_STUS_ID = 10
AND A.ORD_STUS_ID = 4 AND A.ORD_PV_YEAR > 0 AND A.ORD_PV_MONTH > 0
AND A.ORD_STUS_ID = 4 AND A.ORD_PV_YEAR = 0 AND A.ORD_PV_MONTH = 0
AND K.STUS_CODE_ID = 21 AND A.ORD_STUS_ID != 10
AND K.STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND A.ORD_STUS_ID != 10
) T ORDER BY T.ORD_ID DESC
